channel.title: How to make a teleportation npc [pi]
channel.description:
Hello, i would like to ask you guys, on how to make a teleportation npc,
Like
if you talk with a npc called Golrie (dwarf) he will say: Would you like to get teleported to the SkillZone? And you can answer Yes/No And then when you press yes, he teles u,
Answer please?

item.title: How to make a teleportation npc [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Yeah, i just gotta know it, lol.

Read full topic
